Text: Hi, are the UK subs hardcoded on this? I don't watch films on my PC (as it's an old crap one), I burn them to DVD. Cheers!

No, the subs are a separate .srt file. Terrific film and thanks for the upload but be warned--the english subs are atrocious. It's painfully obvious that a non-english speaking (or desperately non-fluent) French person sat there with an English-French dictionary and just translated literally. 

Eye-wateringly wooden and clumsy. If you're not a French speaker (I am so I dispensed with the subs), be prepared to wince a lot...

Check here for better subs - Thanks for the upload !!
http://www.opensubtitles.org/en/subtitles/3631236/mesrine-public-enemy-1-en
I browsed the above subtitles link and they're absolutely awful too, I'd hunt for another torrent unless you want to go sub shopping.
